content: 在另一个世界有另一个你，它的故事因你而改变。智能体世界开启属于你们的文明旅程。新的冒险，从外貌到性格全由你来创造。Nti省时master精细，现在就让你的世界开始运转。智能体诞生后，你的一句话就能定方向、改路径。升级住所，推进职业，改变命运。想知道智能体在想什么？Game mode观察行为与心理。Data mode查看关系、价格和排名，帮他们做出更高收益的决策。每个智能体各自生活，与他们交谈，聆听内心的回响。翻开面板细读状态、行囊、职业与日记。在这片像素大陆，每个智能体的决定源自多层次的AI框架。从个体到世界，数据记录着文明的每一步成长。更多建筑等你和智能体一步步解锁。唤醒城市，迎接未知的冒险与故事。智能体世界不只是游戏，它是你与另一个自己共同创造文明的开始。

key_facts: FACT: In another world, an alternate version of you exists and shapes its story through your choices.
FACT: The Agent World allows players to embark on a civilization-building journey together with their digital counterpart.
FACT: Players can fully customize both appearance and personality of their AI agents from the start.
FACT: Agents can be directed by a single sentence, which alters their path and development trajectory.
FACT: Players can upgrade homes, advance careers, and reshape individual destinies within the world.
FACT: Game Mode enables observation of agent behavior and internal psychological states.
FACT: Data Mode provides insights into relationships, pricing trends, and rankings to optimize decisions.
FACT: Each agent lives independently and interacts with the environment based on AI-driven logic.
FACT: Players can communicate directly with agents and listen to their inner thoughts and reflections.
FACT: The agent's status, inventory, career, and personal diary are accessible via a detailed panel interface.
FACT: The world operates on a multi-layered AI framework governing individual and collective actions.
FACT: All player and agent actions are recorded as data, tracking the evolution of civilization over time.
FACT: New buildings unlock progressively as players and agents advance through gameplay.
key_opinions: OPINION: The ability to shape another version of oneself offers a deeply personal and meaningful experience.
OPINION: The freedom to influence agents with minimal input creates a powerful sense of agency.
OPINION: The integration of psychological observation adds emotional depth beyond typical gameplay mechanics.
OPINION: Data-driven decision-making enhances strategic engagement and long-term planning.
OPINION: The pixel-based world design evokes nostalgia while supporting complex systems.
OPINION: The narrative potential of evolving civilizations feels limitless and uniquely immersive.
key_datapoints: DATA: Agents evolve based on layered AI frameworks that govern individual and societal behavior.
DATA: Player actions and agent decisions are continuously logged as part of civilization growth data.
DATA: Progression unlocks new buildings and features in a step-by-step advancement system.
DATA: Agent personalities and choices are dynamically influenced by environmental and social inputs.
DATA: Real-time behavioral and psychological data is available through Game Mode observation tools.
